title: [Large-Scale] Case Study-Based Pedagogical Development for Integrating Islamic Values in Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational sociological concepts and general understanding of Islamic culture
context.additional_context: Explores methods of integrating Islamic values into sociological topics by combining online and offline activities. Students learn to apply these methods to real educational models through case analysis.

learning_goals: A theoretical model integrating Islamic values into sociological themes can be analyzed through case studies.
A step-by-step plan for integrating Islamic values can be designed by referencing the 2013 curriculum framework.
The monomyth paradigm can be applied to incorporate religious contexts into the initiation, midpoint, and closure stages of an educational curriculum.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
